If the occupancy increases, will the internal temperature rise, all other factors being constant?
Explanation: Increasing the occupancy results in a higher heat increment since the adjustment delta relies positively on the external and internal temperature difference, more drastically when external temperature is below 50. Thus, more people contribute to maintaining or even increasing the internal temperature through the adjustment calculation.
